thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Southwark (Borough Market) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of Premier Inn London Southwark (Borough Market) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Gail S
title: Great location
text: Superbly located for exploring London, short walk to London Bridge Station & Blackfriars. Well insulated rooms, usual excellent quality beds. WiFi variable - tell them if you need reliable Wifi as it seems to vary from room to room - avoid 121 - 123. The staff here were especially charming, we'll be staying again. There is a small amount of parking, first come first served, but during our stay it was hardly used.
